name: MONOBOT - Demo
description:
This is the demo of MONOBOT, the game is still in development and shall be released at the end of 2020. If you like our game, please add us to your wishlist on Steam:)

Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1212850/MONOBOT/

Brief Intro:

MONOBOT is a physics-based action puzzle-platformer game. Observation, thinking, controlling, trial and error are the keys to solve the puzzles.

Monobot is a small robot you will be playing as in the game, who solves the puzzles by using his unique skills. "Gravity defines jump height" would be the biggest obstacle in your journey.

Specialites:

  • Gravity defines jump height, the height you can jump is relative to the gravity of your current space.
  • Modularized body parts bring about different skills, mix and match to breakthrough the obstacles.
  • Physics-based controlling experience.
  • Various types of vehicles/carriers to manipulate.
  • Futuristic wasteland presented by concise art style.

Background story:

After many year of reigning over by the aliens, the hopeless human elites initiated [Operation God-Creation]. All the humans went into hibernation after the preliminary construction on the planet, after many years another force came to this planet in serect, and monobot was awoken by the force. There is no way back, he can only keep going forward even though everything is already in debris...
